title: IS_EMAIL_ADDRESS
description: Returns TRUE if the provided string is formatted as a valid email address; otherwise, returns FALSE.
examples:
IS_EMAIL_ADDRESS("user.example.com")
-- Returns FALSE, as it lacks the '@' symbol

IS_EMAIL_ADDRESS("user@")
-- Returns FALSE, as it lacks a domain
